channel.title: Comments for page "Tiny Three"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Tiny Three"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: You can own all of the Tiny Bee Weapons, but you can only have one active at a time.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: That said, its possible to have more than one tiny bee weapon, amirite?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: When you first get a Tiny Bee Weapon, a Vault opens up on your front page. You can store your Weapon in the Vault, and the game will act like you don't have it anymore while it's in there, so you can win the other two variants.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Perhaps I'm just being ignorant, but how would you even get this trophy? Isn't the Hive set so that if you already have a tiny bee weapon then you can't get the tiny beezooka? And isn't the festival is set so that if you already have a tiny bee weapon you can't get the tiny bee rifle?
